name: Multiverse Runner
description:
Oh no! You've opened a multiverse breach! Try to survive in as many multiverse as possible. New multiverses are created when you get in contact with universal diamonds.

Controls:

  • Left click on a multiverse to switch between Day/Night
  • Bears will attack you if they are awake
  • Evil bushes will eat you if they are in the darkness

Team:

  • Vidu: Artist
  • wRadion: Code
  • VisionElf: Code
  • Mistersyms: Musics and sound effects
